description.oldValue:
Outlook on the web will update the location of some of the compose options for a message , including the "Send", "Discard", and formatting options. This brings the experience in web closer to the classic and new Outlook for Windows.
GA date: September CY2022
description.newValue: Outlook on the web will update the location of some of the compose options for a message , including the "Send", "Discard", and formatting options. This brings the experience in web closer to the classic and new Outlook for Windows.
